title: Queen
content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Queen

Queen may refer to:

  • Queen Efaritay, the legendary Icyene queen of Hallowvale.
  • Queen Ellamaria, wife of King Roald.
  • Fairy Queen, the ruler of Zanaris and the fairies, who is involved in the Fairy Tale quest series.
  • Queen Glarial, a legendary elven queen married to the powerful king Baxtorian until her death and has a grandson named Islwyn.
  • Ice Queen, resides under White Wolf Mountain and drops the ice gloves used in several quests, notably Heroes' Quest, Recipe for Disaster, and Desert Treasure.
  • Kalphite Queen, a boss monster in the Kalphite Lair.
  • Penance Queen, the boss monster of the Barbarian Assault minigame.
  • The Queen of Thieves, a quest and NPC named eponymously as the alias of Lady Shauna Piscarilius.
  • Sea Slug Queen, the main antagonist in the Sea Slug quest series.
  • Sea Troll Queen, a quest boss monster who attacked the Piscatoris Fishing Colony along with her Sea Trolls during Swan Song.
  • Queen Sigrid, the queen of the island of Etceteria.
 This page is used to distinguish between articles with similar names.
If an internal link led you to this disambiguation page, you may wish to change the link to point directly to the intended article.
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
'''Queen''' may refer to:
*[[Queen Efaritay]], the legendary Icyene queen of [[Hallowvale]].
*[[Queen Ellamaria]], wife of [[King Roald]].
*[[Fairy Queen]], the ruler of [[Zanaris]] and the fairies, who is involved in the [[Fairy Tale quest series]].
*[[Glarial|Queen Glarial]], a legendary elven queen married to the powerful king [[rsw:Baxtorian|Baxtorian]] until her death and has a grandson named [[Islwyn]].
*[[Ice Queen]], resides under [[White Wolf Mountain]] and drops the [[ice gloves]] used in several [[quest]]s, notably [[Heroes' Quest]], [[Recipe for Disaster]], and [[Desert Treasure]].
*[[Kalphite Queen]], a boss monster in the [[Kalphite Lair]].
*[[Penance Queen]], the boss monster of the [[Barbarian Assault]] [[minigame]].
*[[The Queen of Thieves]], a [[quest]] and [[NPC]] named eponymously as the alias of [[Lady Shauna Piscarilius]].
*[[Mother Mallum|Sea Slug Queen]], the main antagonist in the [[Sea Slug]] quest series.
*[[Sea Troll Queen]], a quest boss monster who attacked the [[Piscatoris Fishing Colony]] along with her [[Sea Troll]]s during [[Swan Song]].
*[[Queen Sigrid]], the queen of the island of [[Etceteria]].

{{disambig}}
